long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Our extension offers a simple and fair pricing solution for your customers. It automatically rounds prices ending in 99 or 49 rupees to the nearest whole number, eliminating any perceived illusion of overcharging. This feature not only makes prices easier for customers to understand, but it also helps to maintain profitability for your business. With our extension, you can have peace of mind knowing that your pricing is fair, compliant with laws and regulations, and easy for your customers to understand.
